Sentence: Meanwhile, on a continent east of Westeros, Daenerys Targaryen marries the warlord Khal Drogo, one of the leaders of the Dothraki people
Daenerys and her (Drogo) brother Viserys are the last surviving members of the family Robert defeated to become king, the Targaryens
During a feast he (knight) attacks Daenerys in a rage, and Khal Drogo has Viserys killed by dumping molten gold on his (knight) head
Daenerys sets a funeral pyre to burn Drogo and the woman, who tricked her (woman) and essentially killed her (woman) husband and child
